adjectives.description: opportunistic (comparative more opportunistic, superlative most opportunistic)

entries.meaning: Taking advantage of situations that arise.
examples: The danger now isn't so much from the AIDS virus itself as from opportunistic infections.

entries.meaning: Taking advantage of situations to advance one's own interests without regard for moral principles.
examples: You can't trust somebody that opportunistic: he'll stab you in the back the first chance he gets.
